channel.title: Maika Monroe on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘100 Nights of Hero’ Review: Emma Corrin, Maika Monroe and Charli xcx Rock Cool Frocks in a Style-Over-Substance Fantasy Film
item.description: Nicholas Galitzine co-stars in writer-director Julia Jackman’s Venice-bowing second feature, based on a graphic novel by Isabel Greenberg.
